rooms.description: Multi-functional space serving as living area, dining space and home office. Vastu principles are followed by aligning the entrance to the east ensuring positive energy flow. Minimal budget-friendly finishes.
Efficient kitchen space with integrated storage. West-facing window for natural ventilation but shielded from harsh western sun using awnings as per local building norms and Vastu suggestions.
Compact bathroom with essential fixtures. Strategically placed to align with south-west corner for balance according to Vastu principles.

openings.position: east side of studio living area
openings.description: Entrance door leading directly into the multi-functional space, ensuring a positive energy flow as per Vastu guidelines. Budget-friendly material used.
Small window designed to allow natural light while mitigating harsh afternoon sun. Uses cost-effective glazing solutions.

levels.level_description: Ground floor layout of the duplex studio apartment with a large garden area integrated along the perimeter. The design balances industrial aesthetics with functional spaces, ensuring adherence to local building norms and Vastu guidelines while keeping budget constraints in mind.
